question: does ubuntu come with divx cod: no. but if you try to read a divx, you'll get a nice message asking you if you want to install them.
and then if you answer yes, it will install the codecs for you
same with all standard proprietary codecs really : they are not there by default for legal reasons .. but Ubuntu is rather helpful when you appear to need them
